about_the_game:
Falling Day is an emotional, story-driven adventure game about coming of age and resolving supernatural mysteries. In this game, two students named Paris and Ashira become involved in several mysteries, murders, suicides, and paranormal incidents. The two must cooperate in order to discover the truth.



"Paris" a teenage boy has just lost his dearest buddy. He therefore intended to jump off a building that was abandoned behind the school, but as soon as he got there, he witnessed "Ashira" leaping off the building in front of him. He ran home out of shock but the following morning, Ashira, who should have “passed away”, was present in the classroom, sitting there as if nothing had happened…

Key Features

  • Coming of age

    It is the time when we start to feel like we are not children anymore. There are both good and bad things, including experiences that cause sadness in the mind like being bullied or losing a family member. Players will experience these stories through two teenage boys who are facing life problems while having no one left by their side. They will heal their hearts and help each other cope with various events.

  • Day and Night

    Alternating day and night gameplay to give different feelings. During the daytime, the tone will be more relaxing. The story will focus on school life and give players the freedom to explore and interact with the characters. At night, there will be a serious tone, focusing on investigating the origins of secrets and supernatural stories.

  • Puzzle With Story

    Using storytelling through puzzle gameplay, investigating ghosts' memories, and bringing their memories back to them. Players will solve challenging puzzles while absorbing interesting stories at the same time.

  • Positive Energy

    The player's choices will affect the two protagonists, causing them to grow up and escape their sorrows. The outcome will be good or not depending on the player's actions through the Positive Energy system, resulting in different events. This value will affect the conclusion at the end of the game.

Falling Day is an emotional, story-driven adventure game about coming of age and resolving supernatural mysteries. He ran home out of shock but the following morning, Ashira, who should have “passed away”, was present in the classroom, sitting there as if nothing had happened…

name: Falling Day

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
